statements: SELECT * FROM golf_lessons WHERE lesson_id = 1;
SELECT lesson_date, lesson_time FROM golf_lessons WHERE student_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM golf_lessons WHERE instructor_id = 2 AND lesson_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_time, student_id FROM golf_lessons WHERE instructor_id = 3 ORDER BY lesson_time DESC;
SELECT MAX(lesson_date) FROM golf_lessons;
SELECT * FROM golf_lessons;
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, lesson_time FROM golf_lessons WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, instructor_id, student_id FROM golf_lessons WHERE lesson_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lesson_id, student_id, instructor_id FROM golf_lessons WHERE student_id = 5 ORDER BY lesson_date DESC;
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_time, student_id, instructor_id FROM golf_lessons WHERE instructor_id = 3 ORDER BY lesson_time;
SELECT * FROM golf_lessons
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, lesson_time FROM golf_lessons WHERE instructor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM golf_lessons ORDER BY lesson_date DESC
SELECT instructor_id, COUNT(student_id) AS student_count FROM golf_lessons GROUP BY instructor_id
SELECT * FROM instructor_availability WHERE availability_date > '2022-11-01'
SELECT * FROM golf_lessons WHERE lesson_date = '2022-05-15' ORDER BY lesson_time DESC;

SELECT * FROM golf_lessons JOIN instructor_availability ON golf_lessons.instructor_id = instructor_availability.instructor_id WHERE availability_date = '2022-05-15' AND availability_start_time >= '08:00:00';
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, lesson_time, instructor_id, student_id FROM golf_lessons WHERE student_id IN (SELECT instructor_id FROM instructor_availability WHERE availability_date = '2022-05-15');
SELECT lesson_date, COUNT(lesson_id) AS lesson_count FROM golf_lessons GROUP BY lesson_date HAVING lesson_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM golf_lessons WHERE instructor_id = (SELECT instructor_id FROM instructor_availability WHERE availability_date = '2022-05-15') ORDER BY lesson_date ASC, lesson_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM golf_lessons;
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, lesson_time FROM golf_lessons WHERE lesson_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM facilities WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT instructor_name, specialty, available_days FROM instructors;
SELECT * FROM golf_lessons ORDER BY lesson_date DESC, lesson_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM golf_lessons WHERE lesson_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM facilities WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT lesson_id, instructor_name, lesson_date FROM golf_lessons INNER JOIN instructors ON golf_lessons.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id WHERE specialty = 'Beginner';
SELECT lesson_time, facility_name FROM golf_lessons INNER JOIN facilities ON golf_lessons.lesson_id = facilities.facility_id WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY lesson_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS lesson_count, facility_name FROM golf_lessons INNER JOIN facilities ON golf_lessons.lesson_id = facilities.facility_id GROUP BY facility_name HAVING lesson_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM GolfLessons;
SELECT lesson_id, instructor_id, student_id, lesson_date, lesson_time FROM GolfLessons;
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM Facilities WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_id, available_date, available_time_start, available_time_end FROM Availability ORDER BY available_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GolfLessons WHERE lesson_id = 1;
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, instructor_id FROM GolfLessons WHERE lesson_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, years_of_experience FROM Instructors ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM Facilities WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM Availability WHERE available_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM golf_lessons_schedule;
SELECT lesson_date, lesson_time, student_id FROM golf_lessons_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM golf_instructors ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM golf_students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM golf_courses WHERE course_duration > 3;
SELECT * FROM golf_lessons_schedule WHERE lesson_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT lesson_id, lesson_date, lesson_time FROM golf_lessons_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 1 ORDER BY lesson_date DESC, lesson_time ASC;

SELECT student_name, instructor_name, lesson_date FROM golf_students JOIN golf_lessons_schedule ON golf_students.student_id = golf_lessons_schedule.student_id JOIN golf_instructors ON golf_lessons_schedule.instructor_id = golf_instructors.instructor_id WHERE lesson_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT course_name, course_description, course_duration FROM golf_courses WHERE course_duration > 60;

SELECT instructor_name, availability_date, available_slots FROM golf_instructors JOIN instructor_availability ON golf_instructors.instructor_id = instructor_availability.instructor_id WHERE available_slots > 0 ORDER BY availability_date ASC;
